post.description: Creates a new ApiKey and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the ApiKey with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: ApiKey with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the ApiKey with the requested ID.

204.description: ApiKey with requested ID was deleted
